Cave of Time
About Code

I woke up from a dream one day where I found a cave that was a time portal. Google searches later, to determine what this dream could mean, led me to this book "Cave of Time."

I found the book wildly entertaining so I set out to build a digital version of this "Choose Your Own Adventure Game." I also wanted to play around with Vue/NuxtJS and Strapi.

The story is written by Edward Packard. You can purchase the book here.
